mapper.select: SELECT s.cateid,s.storename, s.storeaddr, s.storestatus, m.menuname, m.menuprice, mm.menuimg FROM store s INNER JOIN menu m ON m.storeid = s.storeid INNER JOIN menuimgs mm ON mm.menuid = m.menuid WHERE cateid=#{cateid}
SELECT * FROM store s LEFT OUTER JOIN storeimgs ss ON s.storeid = ss.storeid GROUP BY storename HAVING storename LIKE CONCAT('%',#{txt},'%')

SELECT s.storeid, s.storename, s.storeintroduce, s.storetel, s.storeinfo, s.storeaddr, m.menuid, m.menuname, m.menuprice, m.menuinfo, mi.menuimg FROM store s INNER JOIN menu m ON s.storeid = m.storeid INNER JOIN menuimgs mi ON mi.menuid = m.menuid WHERE s.storeid = #{storeid}
mapper.update: UPDATE store SET cateid=#{cateid}, storename=#{storename}, storeintroduce=#{storeintroduce}, storetel=#{storetel}, storestatus=#{storestatus}, storeinfo=#{storeinfo}, storeaddr=#{storeaddr} WHERE storeid=#{storeid}
